statements: SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, end_date FROM courses WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT course_id, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY instructor DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE is_completed = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND is_completed = FALSE ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' OR instructor = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, end_date FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, end_date, start_date FROM courses WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' AND start_date >= '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM student_progress WHERE completed = TRUE ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM courses GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date FROM courses INNER JOIN student_progress ON courses.course_id = student_progress.course_id WHERE student_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, progress_status FROM courses, course_progress WHERE courses.course_id = course_progress.course_id;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(student_id) AS student_count FROM course_progress GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC
SELECT * FROM course_progress WHERE progress_percent > 50

SELECT course_name, student_name, progress_status FROM courses INNER JOIN course_progress ON courses.course_id = course_progress.course_id INNER JOIN students ON course_progress.student_id = students.student_id
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_duration FROM Courses WHERE course_duration > 6;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_phone FROM Students WHERE student_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT course_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Courses c JOIN Enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id JOIN Students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id;
SELECT course_name, module_number, module_completed FROM Courses c JOIN Enrollments e ON c.course_id = e.course_id JOIN Progress p ON e.enrollment_id = p.enrollment_id WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE completed = TRUE AND enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, count(enrollment_id) AS total_enrollments FROM enrollments GROUP BY course_id HAVING total_enrollments >= 5;
